title: Covid-19 live updates: Situation in India ‘beyond heartbreaking,’ WHO chief says
description: More new coronavirus infections have been reported around in the world in just the past week than in the first five months of the pandemic, said Tedros of the WHO.

title: India Continues Shattering Virus Records as World Pledges Aid
description: The Biden administration plans to send AstraZeneca vaccine doses to other nations after a safety review. Vaccinated tourists from the United States can visit Europe this summer.

title: Covid-19 Live Updates: Crisis in India Deepens as Countries Pledge Aid
description: Oxygen and other supplies are unlikely to spare India further catastrophe. In Brazil, Russia’s Sputnik V vaccine isn’t recommended. Greece eased its quarantine requirements for visitors.

title: Rep. Khanna Calls For U.S. To Provide More COVID-19 Assistance To India
description: NPR's Steve Inskeep talks to Democratic Rep. Ro Khanna of California about India's COVID-19 crisis. Khanna is vice chair of the India caucus, and urges the administration to take action.

title: As Covid-19 Devastates India, Deaths Go Undercounted
description: Fatalities have been overlooked or downplayed, understating the human toll of the country’s outbreak, which accounts for nearly half of all new cases in a global surge.

title: China says it is open to India and others joining COVID-19 conference
description: The Chinese foreign ministry said on Tuesday that China was open to India and other South Asian countries participating in a virtual conference on fighting COVID-19.

title: Vaccines appear effective against India COVID variant | DW | 27.04.2021
description: The B.1.617 variant raised alarms after it was identified as a double mutant. But the fact that both mutations occur together does not necessarily mean that this variant is also twice as infectious or dangerous.

title: U.S. Chamber sees risk of faltering Indian economy due to COVID-19 spike
description: The U.S. Chamber of Commerce on Monday warned that the Indian economy - the world's sixth largest - could falter as a result of a record spike in coronavirus cases, creating a drag for the global economy.

title: Washington families worry as COVID-19 ravages India
description: Western Washington's Indian community is organizing an effort to assist family and friends impacted by a devastating wave of COVID-19 cases overseas.

description: U.S. vaccinations are slowing, though new virus cases remain high. Covid wards in Michigan are filled with younger patients.

title: Thailand starts stricter COVID-19 shutdown, but experts say not enough
description: Thailand's government slapped restrictions on travel from India on Monday over concerns of imported coronavirus cases and closed more venues in Bangkok, even as it came under fire for not doing enough to contain a spike in infections.

title: Indian Americans in U.S. Congress, tech organize COVID-19 aid to India
description: Some U.S. lawmakers and wealthy technology executives have joined forces to boost aid to India as it grapples with a severe spike in coronavirus infections, with a focus on ensuring aid is equally distributed across the country, a Congress member said.

title: Hindu priest in Plano loses family members in South India as COVID-19 surges
description: President Joe Biden announced Sunday that the U.S. will send supplies, including PPE and medical equipment, as India sets pandemic records for new cases.

title: Gilead to ship 450,000 remdesivir vials to India as COVID-19 cases surge
description: Gilead Sciences Inc said on Monday it will give India at least 450,000 vials of its antiviral drug remdesivir and help boost production, as the world's second-most populous country reels from surging coronavirus cases.

title: DOD to Aid India as it Copes With COVID-19 Pandemic

title: India’s Devastating Covid-19 Crisis: How Canada Can Be A Strong Ally
description: As India deals with a devastating second wave of Covid-19, other nations are rushing to help. Canada can be a strong ally and help India with vaccine equity and other critical needs

title: U.S. Sending Emergency Assistance As COVID-19 Overwhelms India's Health System
description: India is now where the coronavirus is spreading fastest. The country's health system is collapsing under the weight of record-breaking caseloads. The U.S. is sending assistance.

title: ‘Pray for the people of India’: a country suffering ‘unimaginable’ Covid-19 outbreak
description: In one diocese nine priests and two women religious have been lost to Covid-19 just in April. The deceased clergy include four Jesuits.

title: Royal Caribbean halts hiring in India, suspends Indian crew assignments as Covid cases surge
description: Royal Caribbean Cruises is temporarily suspending all assignments for its staff from India and will halt hiring in the country.

title: Oil falls on India's COVID surge; OPEC+ limits drop
description: Oil pared its losses on Monday as the Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries and its allies indicated that it was watching surging COVID-19 cases in India, which may dent fuel demand in the world's third-biggest oil importer.

title: Twitter ordered to take down posts critical of India's Covid response
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has been accused of downplaying the country’s response to the pandemic, which has killed more than 195,000 people.

title: India’s covid-19 tragedy: Photos and videos show a nation on the brink
India Posts Fifth Consecutive Day of 300,000-Plus New COVID-19 Infections as World Sends Badly Needed Aid
description:
The head of the World Health Organization said India’s situation is “beyond heartbreaking” as the country reported nearly 353,000 new confirmed cases of COVID-19 on Monday, the fifth consecutive day of more than 300,000 coronavirus infections.

"WHO is doing everything we can, providing critical equipment and supplies, including thousands of oxygen concentrators, prefabricated mobile field hospitals and laboratory supplies," WHO chief Tedros Ghebreyesus told a briefing from Geneva.

He noted the WHO has already announced 2,600 extra WHO staff members will go to India to help with efforts to

title: Switzerland puts India on COVID-19 quarantine list
description: Switzerland has added India to its list of high-risk countries from which travellers must enter quarantine following the surge of cases in the subcontinent and the discovery here of a first case of new variant of COVID-19 first identified in India.

title: Bengaluru, facing India's second-highest COVID-19 surge, to enter lockdown
description: The city of Bengaluru, home to the technology operations of hundreds of global companies, is to enter a two-week lockdown as India battles a sharp surge in COVID-19 infections, officials said on Monday.

title: Covid-19: Countries rally to support India through “storm that has shaken the nation”
description:
Countries around the world have pledged to help India as the country continues to see an exponential rise in covid-19 cases and deaths, with hospitals running out of oxygen, drugs, and beds.

India reported a record high of 352 991 daily confirmed covid-19 cases and 2812 deaths on 25 April, according to the Johns Hopkins University database.1 This brings the cumulative total of deaths to 195 123, although the true figure is believed to be much higher.

Hospitals in India have been pleading publicly for help as they run out of oxygen. At least 20 covid-19 patients died at the private Jaipur Golden Hospital in North west Delhi following a dip in oxygen pressure.2 India’s crematoriums and burial grounds are reported to be overwhelmed.3

In a radio address …

title: On the front lines of India’s second wave of COVID-19
description: India’s healthcare system has been overwhelmed by a devastating second wave of COVID-19.

title: Coronavirus: Is India counting all COVID deaths? | DW | 26.04.2021
description: Coronavirus infections in India have been hitting record peaks for the past few days and the death toll has been on the rise. But the official death count doesn't tell the full story, say experts.

title: India's economy holding up well against COVID-19 surge, says RBI
description: India's economic activity has held up well against the recent spike in COVID-19 cases but the rise in infections risks protracted restrictions and inflationary pressures, the central bank (RBI) said in its monthly bulletin on Monday.

title: Coronavirus tally: Global cases of COVID-19 top 147 million as India continues to set daily case records
description: The global tally for the coronavirus-borne illness rose above 147 million on Monday, as the death toll increased to 3.11 million, according to data...

title: COVID-19 infections surge in Nepal, fueled by mutant strains from India
description: Authorities in Nepal were grappling to contain the rapid rise of COVID-19 cases with experts fearing that thousands of people in the Himalayan state have caught the more infectious mutant strains emerging out of India.

title: India’s New Covid Mystery
description: Many people in India thought the country had escaped the worst of Covid-19. What happened?

title: Covid-19 in India: Patients struggle at home as hospitals choke
description: India's Covid sick struggle to get treatment at home due to black marketing of oxygen and drugs.

title: Why the World Should Worry About India
description: The world’s largest vaccine producer is struggling to overcome its latest COVID-19 surge—and that’s everyone’s problem.

title: Modi: India Shaken by Surge in COVID Cases, Urges Vaccinations
description:
COVID-19 has shaken India, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi said in his monthly radio address Sunday, as he urged citizens to get their shots and not be swayed by what he called “any rumor about the vaccine.”

The remarks came as the capital city of New Delhi extended by one week a lockdown that was set to be lifted Monday.  

India’s health ministry said 349,691 new cases had been recorded in the nation in the previous 24-hour period, yet another daily record.

title: India sets Covid-19 infection record for fourth straight day
description: India reported 349,691 new cases of Covid-19 on Saturday, the fourth day in a row the country has set a world record for daily infections during the coronavirus pandemic.

title: Social media platforms become triage centers as India struggles with a COVID-19 surge
description: The country had a record 2,767 COVID deaths on Saturday

title: India's richest people are fleeing on private jets as the country hits almost 350,000 COVID-19 infections in another daily global record
description: Several countries have imposed travel restrictions on visitors from India as it battles a catastrophic second coronavirus wave.

title: India's COVID-19 Cases Break World Records 4 Days In A Row
description: Nearly 350,000 new cases were confirmed Sunday, more than any country on any day since the pandemic began. India's health system is collapsing. There are pleas for oxygen, hospital beds and medicine.

title: Indian coronavirus variant reaches Switzerland -government says
description: The first case of the Indian variant of COVID-19 has been confirmed in Switzerland, the Federal Office for Public Health (BAG) said, as other countries introduce travel bans to contain its spread.

title: A Covid-19 Vaccine’s 1,500-Mile Journey Through India
description: India is simultaneously battling the world’s worst infection surge and carrying out one of the most logistically complex vaccination campaigns. One shot’s arduous trip from a bioreactor tank to a village schoolteacher’s arm.

title: India Coronavirus Cases Set New Global Record, US Readies Help
description:
India set a new global record of the most number of coronavirus infections in a day, as the United States said it was racing to send help to the country.

India’s number of cases surged by 349,691 in the past 24 hours, the fourth straight day of record peaks, and hospitals in Delhi and across the country are turning away patients after running out of medical oxygen and beds.

“Our hearts go out to the Indian people in the midst of the horrific COVID-19 outbreak.

title: A terrifying coronavirus surge is overwhelming India’s health care system
description: India set a pandemic record with almost 347,000 new cases in a day.

title: Oxygen Rationing, Test Shortages: India Caught Unprepared In COVID-19 Crisis
description: India's health system is collapsing under a record surge of coronavirus cases. Hospitals are overloaded and experiencing widespread dearth of life-saving equipment and medicines.

title: Haunting Images From The Covid-19 Crisis In India
description: With crematoriums overrun, bodies are reportedly being burned in parks and on sidewalks.
